description:
Welcome back to "Downton Abbey" -- a new trailer for Season 5 of the British drama, which premieres on ITV in its native land in September and on PBS in January 2015, has finally arrived.欢迎《唐顿庄园》回归——一则《唐顿庄园》第五季最新官方预告发布，《唐顿庄园》第五季将会在2014年9月在英国ITV开播，而美国的PBS电视台也会在2015年播出这部热门英剧。

It's got epic music, fires, horses and Dame Maggie Smith being a badass, not to mention the appearance of new guest stars Richard Grant and Anna Chancellor, the consideration that servants might also be human beings and some other fun tidbits.在预告片中有熟悉的主题曲、起火、马和史密斯夫人当坏人，预告片中还有一些新的客串面孔出现，如Richard Grant和Anna  Chancellor，预告片中还看到了有人在说仆人也是人，以及一些其他内容。

Check it out below. "Downton Abbey" Season 5 premieres January 4, 2015 on PBS. 预告片如下。《唐顿庄园》第五季将会在2015年1月5日在PBS开播。

title: 《唐顿庄园》第五季官方预告片发布
